name: palely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not bright and strong, especially in colour : There was a card tied to the ribbon, on which was a palely visible message. The moonlight shimmered palely on the surface of the lake.
(of the face or skin) in a way that has less colour than usual, for example when the person is ill or frightened: His mother sat palely by the phone until he called. Her huge glasses drew attention to her palely perfect face.
